original_text: And he brought out the people that were in it, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. Even so dealt David with all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그 가운데 백성을 끌어내어 톱과 쇠도끼와 돌써래로 일하게 하니라 다윗이 암몬 자손의 모든 성읍을 이같이 하고 다윗이 모든 백성과 함께 예루살렘으로 돌아오니라

sentences.original_text: And he brought out the people
with all the cities of the children of Ammon
sentences.korean_translation: 암몬 자손의 모든 성읍에 대하여도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem
